author: MandaloreGaming
description:
The SOMA Review comes just in time for the game's 10th anniversary, and a SOMA ARG that launched inside of Simon's in-game PC leading to Frictional Game's next project - Hotel Samsara. This wasn't planned for half a year or anything, I was just being slammed by horrors a few months.
Support the channel at: https://patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
Thumbnail and additional art by @sneksucks 
00:00 - Intro
00:28 - The Frictional Follow-up and The Pig in the Room
14:04 - Game Opening
18:52 - Visuals
25:21 - Music & Audio Design
30:23 - Gameplay Mechanics
39:47 - Story (SPOILERS)
01:13:18 - Conclusions
01:14:31 - Credits
01:15:37 - Ascension

#soma #frictionalgames #pcgaming #gaming #games #hotelsamsara
title: SOMA Review
